00020 // the constructor
00021 PortAbstraction::PortAbstraction(QDomNode& portNode): 
00022 logicalName_(QString()),
00023 displayName_(QString()), 
00024 description_(QString()), 
00025 transactional_(), 
00026 wire_(),
00027 portType_(General::WIRE) {
00028 
00029         for (int i = 0; i < portNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00030                 QDomNode tempNode = portNode.childNodes().at(i);
00031 
00032                 if (tempNode.isComment()) {
00033                         continue;
00034                 }
00035 
00036                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:logicalName")) {
00037                         logicalName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00038                 }
00039 
00040                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:displayName")) {
00041                         displayName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00042                 }
00043 
00044                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:description")) {
00045                         description_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00046                 }
00047 
00048                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:wire")) {
00049                         portType_ = General::WIRE;
00050                         wire_ = QSharedPointer<WireAbstraction>(
00051                                         new WireAbstraction(tempNode));
00052                 }
00053 
00054                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:transactional")) {
00055                         portType_ = General::TRANSACTIONAL;
00056                         transactional_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalAbstraction>(
00057                                         new TransactionalAbstraction(tempNode));
00058                 }
00059         }
00060 
00061         // if mandatory elements are missing
00062         if (logicalName_.isNull()) {
00063                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00064                                 "spirit:port"));
00065         }
00066 
00067         if (!wire_ && !transactional_) {
00068                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("No spirit:wire or spirit:transactional"
00069                                 " elements found within spirit:port"));
00070         }
00071         return;
00072 }
00073 
00074 PortAbstraction::PortAbstraction( const PortAbstraction& other ):
00075 logicalName_(other.logicalName_),
00076 displayName_(other.displayName_),
00077 description_(other.description_),
00078 transactional_(),
00079 wire_(),
00080 portType_(other.portType_) {
00081 
00082         if (other.wire_) {
00083                 wire_ = QSharedPointer<WireAbstraction>(
00084                         new WireAbstraction(*other.wire_.data()));
00085         }
00086         
00087         if (other.transactional_) {
00088                 transactional_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalAbstraction>(
00089                         new TransactionalAbstraction(*other.transactional_.data()));
00090         }
00091 }

00093 PortAbstraction::PortAbstraction():
00094 logicalName_(),
00095 displayName_(), 
00096 description_(), 
00097 transactional_(), 
00098 wire_(),
00099 portType_(General::WIRE) {
00100 }

00102 PortAbstraction& PortAbstraction::operator=( const PortAbstraction& other ) {
00103         if (this != &other) {
00104                 logicalName_ = other.logicalName_;
00105                 displayName_ = other.displayName_;
00106                 description_ = other.description_;
00107                 portType_ = other.portType_;
00108 
00109                 if (other.wire_) {
00110                         wire_ = QSharedPointer<WireAbstraction>(
00111                                 new WireAbstraction(*other.wire_.data()));
00112                 }
00113                 else
00114                         wire_ = QSharedPointer<WireAbstraction>();
00115 
00116                 if (other.transactional_) {
00117                         transactional_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalAbstraction>(
00118                                 new TransactionalAbstraction(*other.transactional_.data()));
00119                 }
00120                 else
00121                         transactional_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalAbstraction>();
00122         }
00123         return *this;
00124 }

00130 void PortAbstraction::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00131         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:port");
00132 
00133         if (logicalName_.isEmpty()) {
00134                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:logicalname is "
00135                                 "missing in spirit:port"));
00136         }
00137         else {
00138                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:logicalName", logicalName_);
00139         }
00140 
00141         if (!displayName_.isEmpty()) {
00142                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:displayName", displayName_);
00143         }
00144 
00145         if (!description_.isEmpty()) {
00146                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:description", description_);
00147         }
00148 
00149         if (wire_) {
00150                  wire_->write(writer);
00151         }
00152         else if (transactional_) {
00153                 transactional_->write(writer);
00154         }
00155         else {
00156                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("spirit:port does not define the port "
00157                                 "type, no wire or transactional element"));
00158         }
00159 
00160         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:port
00161 }

00167 void PortAbstraction::setTransactional(TransactionalAbstraction *transactional) {
00168         if (wire_) {
00169                 wire_.clear();
00170         }
00171 
00172         if (transactional_) {
00173                 transactional_.clear();
00174         }
00175         transactional_ = QSharedPointer<TransactionalAbstraction>(transactional);
00176         portType_ = General::TRANSACTIONAL;
00177         return;
00178 }
